# Contribution Guidelines

## Issues

Issues regarding how the website (`starling.utdallas.edu`) is displayed must include:

* [ ] Operating System
* [ ] Web Browser & Version
* [ ] Screenshots (if appropriate)

Issues with a Wiki Page or specific content must include:

* [ ] Link to the page
* [ ] Description of the problem

## Pull Requests

With some exceptions, pull requests should only be submitted by members of the StARLinG Lab. Pull requests submitted by non-lab members are welcome, but should be reasonable (e.g. do not add yourself to the 'People' page if you do not actually work with us ðŸ˜§ ). Corrections or clarifications for Wiki pages are an example of a "reasonable" pull request change.

Pull requests should contain:

* [ ] Summary of changes
